p: For each complex, the values of affinity energy (ΔG MM-GBSA), in addition to the values of the energetic contributions involved in the ligand-receptor interaction were obtained. The energy contributions obtained were as follows: van der Waals (ΔE vdW), polar (ΔG GB), non-polar (ΔG NP), and the electrostatic interactions energies (ΔE ele) ( Table 4).
